data.name: Galactic Junk League: Cyberpunk Pilot Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Looking for the best way to enter the Cyberpunk era? Pilot Starter Pack grants you the DLC exclusive 'Phantom' rookie ship and 4 premium Cyberpunk block skins. Combined with 10 days of Space Whisky and 7 days of Pilot License, you'll be more than ready to experience the real Cyberpunk.

The Pilot Starter pack includes:

  • DLC exclusive Cyberpunk rookie ship ‘Phantom’
  • 4 premium blocks from the Cyberpunk building block set
  • 10x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 7 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards

Content of the Pilot Starter Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
